    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    double x

    the x coordinate of the geometry-component (used for display purposes)
    double y

    the y coordinate of the geometry-component (used for display purposes)
    double rotation

    the rotation of the geometry-component (used for display purposes)
    double width

    the width of the geometry-component (used for display purposes)
    double height

    the height of the geometry-component (used for display purposes)
    double length

    the length of the rails of the crossing
    RailType type

    the type of the rails of the crossing
    float angle

    the radius of the crossing
